product_name: La Roche-PosayPigmentclar Dark Circles Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsLa Roche-Posay Pigmentclar Dark Circles Eye Cream targets both blue and brown dark circles for visibly brighter eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly reduces the appearance of dark circles and brightens the eye areaSuitable for sensitive skinAllergy TestedNon-comedogenicKey IngredientsCaffeineFormulated WithoutFragranceOilsItem 2620405How To UseStep 1: Put a pea sized amount onto the metal applicator and use the applicator to apply above and below the eye.Step 2: Massage from the inside of the eye area, outwards.Step 3: Use your fingers to pat the eye area until the formula is fully absorbed.IngredientsAqua/Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Niacinamide, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ammonium Polyacryldimethyltauramide/Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter/Shea Butter, Peg-100 Stearate, Peg/Ppg/Polybutylene Glycol-8/5/3 Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethiconol, Caffeine, Sodium Hydroxide, Silica, Ginkgo Biloba Extract/Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Palmitic Acid, Alumina, Phenylethyl Resorcinol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Poloxamer 338, Disodium Edta, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Ferulic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499/Iron Oxides, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Mica.
how_to_use: Step 1: Put a pea sized amount onto the metal applicator and use the applicator to apply above and below the eye.Step 2: Massage from the inside of the eye area, outwards.Step 3: Use your fingers to pat the eye area until the formula is fully absorbed.
ingredients: Ginkgo Biloba Extract/Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract

reviews.headline: it actually works
reviews.comments: I swear I have tried everything.  I actually see an obvious improvement with this

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: Have been using it forever and I absolutely love it! It lasts surprisingly long and competes my routine. I have such sensitive under eyes and most eye treatments give me a rash but this one is soothing and keeps me clear I love to compete after I moisturize

reviews.headline: Burns under my eyes
reviews.comments: Bought this eye cream and its not really an eye cream its a little tinted is all and has done nothing but burn my skin under my eyes

reviews.headline: absolute best option for my dark circles
reviews.comments:
I have always had dark circles under my eyes. They are due to genetics, but made worse by allergies, diet and more recently, age. I've tried a lot of eye creams. A lot of them made some improvement, but not tons.  It has reached the point when I've used 6 different eye creams at a time - each targeting something slightly different, and different day/night routines. I have also had times I've used only 1 product. 
Pigmentclar simply has the most effect for me, hands down. I can't call it the Holy Grail eye cream for me - it doesn't tackle wrinkles as well as other products. It handles the darkness the best though (coupled with low, processed sugar dietl). It works best when I use it day and night, as the first product. I do follow with a Vitamin C moisturizer in the day, and a wrinkle tackling moisturizer at night. I still get darkness, but it's the best it's ever been.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have tried a good number of skin care brands and never really seen results. I bought this on a whim and after the 1st application I was hooked - the metal applicator is so cool on your eyes it feels great. And then by the 2d application (no kidding) I looked different... My eyes were dark and sunken and now they feel like a normal persons.. I bought this along with Redermic intensive and I am convinced I look a year younger every couple of days (3 weeks I think I look about 45 vs 53) Last week I saw a friend I hadn't seen in 2 weeks, her 1st words 'omg what r u using your skin looks phenomenal' and she went and purchased these
faceoff_positive.headline: amazing!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: Severe allergy reaction!!! After two hours started to itch. The next morning couldn't open my eyes. My eyelid's were huge due to allergy reaction. Very disappointed with this product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Allergy reaction
